vulnerability.name: USN-4747-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4747-1 fixed a vulnerability in screen. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Felix Weinmann discovered that GNU Screen incorrectly handled certain  character sequences. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause GNU  Screen to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute  arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: GNU Screen could be made to crash or run programs if it processed specially crafted character sequences. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
